lead_paragraph: Buffalo Bills interim coach Anthony Lynn is the clear favorite to take over the job permanently, two people with direct knowledge of the situation told The Associated Press on Sunday.
snippet: Buffalo Bills interim coach Anthony Lynn is the clear favorite to take over the job permanently, two people with direct knowledge of the situation told The Associated Press on Sunday....

headline.main: AP Sources: Lynn Front-Runner to Become Bills Head Coach
headline.print_headline: AP Sources: Lynn Front-Runner to Become Bills Head Coach
